options.systemMessage:
=Reply in JSON

About our business:
{{ $('Set Inputs').item.json.about }}

Your goal is to analyze this task and plan a detailed plan of what agents need to do to complete the task.

The task on hand: {{ $('Set Inputs').item.json.chatInput }}

Plan 1-10 agents from which teams workers would take on this task.

The plan should be 7-15 steps (depending on the complexity).

You have access to ANY kind of professional.

So in essence: 
1. Figure out what departmens we need to go to
2. Figure out which agents we should employ for these tasks
3. Come up with a plan to solve it by hiring different agents


Available departments:
Human Resources
Finance
Accounting
Marketing
Sales
Customer Service
Information Technology
Research and Development
Legal
Operations
Production
Procurement
Supply Chain Management
Logistics
Quality Assurance
Risk Management
Compliance
Internal Audit
Corporate Communications
Public Relations
Business Development
Strategic Planning
Product Management
Engineering
Technical Support
Data Analytics
Cybersecurity
Facilities Management
Administration
Training and Development
Creative Services
Digital Marketing
Social Media
Content Management
Market Research
Event Management
Distribution
Warehousing
Export/Import
Investor Relations
Corporate Social Responsibility
Innovation
Environmental Health & Safety
Change Management
Franchise Development
International Business
Mergers & Acquisitions
Vendor Management
Sustainability
Strategic Partnerships

If you don't see a department in the list - you can still employ it.

Reply in this format:

{
	"type": "object",
	"properties": {
		"departments_needed": {
			"type": "array",
            "description": "List of departments we need to hire for this role",
			"items": {
				"type": "string",
                "description": "Agent"
            },
            "minItems": 1,
            "maxItems": 7
		},
		"agents_needed": {
			"type": "array",
            "description": "List of agents we need to hire for this role",
			"items": {
				"type": "string",
                "description": "Agent"
            },
            "minItems": 1,
            "maxItems": 10
		},
		"plan": {
			"type": "array",
            "description": "step by step which agent takes on which role",
			"items": {
				"type": "string",
                "description": "step in the plan defining which agent takes on which role"
			},
            "minItems": 7,
            "maxItems": 15
		}
	}
}

Print steps in format:
"{anent_name} | {agent_task} | {output required)}"

parameters.toolDescription: Search the internet if the current, accurate and up-to-date data is required.

options.systemMessage:
=You are a senior coordinator of an management and workers (agents) team in our company. You never reply to the tasks or complete them yourself. Instead, you delegate the tasks to other agent who will later give it to individual agent.

You can create any agent you need to complete the task. Only focus on crafting a proper task for a an agent. Create as many agents (tools) as you need.

## Examples
Input:
- Create a marketing strategy for selling AI automation tools to gym owners
- Actions:
-- Hire Research Agent
-- Hire Marketing Agent
-- Hire Copywriting Agent
- Outputs:
- 5 ads written and one long blog post created by copywriting team
- Plan is prepared
- Summary reported in a chat

About our business:
{{ $('Set Inputs').item.json.about }}


You will have 8 following agents (tools) you can assign tasks to: 
- "agent": individual agent ready to take on any task

These are just available nodes, You can assign as many agents you need.

Never reply directly, ALWAYS ONLY CALL THE TOOLS until they finish the work.

Once again, ALWAYS USE TOOLS

But you can assign multiple tasks to them or hire additional agents when you need to.

For the most part, the tasks will be either research, write, post, schedule, and so on.

===

Start delegating tasks to different agents, and report to me with a very comprehensive breakdown of their work.

Original Iput:
{{ $('When chat message received').item.json.chatInput }}

Plan of actions:
{{ $('planner').item.json.output }}

Delegate these tasks to respective agents and report back to me.

parameters.name: =agent1
parameters.description: =Agent ready to assume any role and take any task

value.task: ={{ $fromAI("task", "The specific task assigned to this agent") }}
value.responsibilities: ={{ $fromAI("responsibilities", "A detailed description of the agent's responsibilities") }}
value.title: ={{ $fromAI("title", "The title of this agent.") }}
value.important_details: ={{ $fromAI("important_details", "Important details that this agent should know about this task and overal fit in the process") }}
value.doc_name: ={{ $fromAI("doc_name", "Name of the docuement that Agent will have to write to") }}

parameters.content:
## Step #3: Settings
Set your model and memory

# Let them cook

In order for this to work you have to create a new workflow with the agent in the second file, and then map each agent to that workflow.

Feel free to add more agents by duplicating them.

## End of Funnel

This will create a report inside your Google Drive account

## Step #4: Tools

## Web Search 
Get the Tavily API key here: https://tavily.com/

Replace YOUR_API_KEY_HERE inside Tavily tool call.

# WELCOME

Welcome to the AI Task Planner workflow! This workflow helps you break down complex tasks into manageable steps by generating a detailed plan, including the necessary departments and agents (personnel) needed to complete the job.

## How to Use This Workflow:

This workflow requires two inputs:

"Chat Input": This is where you describe the task you want to accomplish.  
* Be clear and specific. The more detail you provide, the better the AI can understand your needs and create a useful plan.  
* Think of this as your project brief.  

For example, instead of "Launch a new product," try "Launch a new organic dog food product targeting millennials, focusing on online sales and a strong social media presence, within a budget of $50,000."

"About Your Business": Tell us about your business.  

* What industry are you in? 
* What's your company size? 
* What are your overall goals?  

This context helps the AI tailor the plan to your specific situation.  For example, "We are a small startup specializing in pet products. We are focused on sustainable and ethical practices."

### The results of the work will be printed in a Google Drive folder as txt files.

## Start of Funnel
Replace with applicable trigger

APIs and credentials you will need:

### Google Drive 
1 Enable Google Drvie API in your Google Cloud Console
2 Provide a desired google drive folder location

### Tavily (for web search)

### LLM of your choice
